alert.note: Alert for Newton (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 5:40PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Newton County through 630 PM CDT... At 540 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Seneca, or 11 miles west of Neosho, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Neosho... Seneca... Racine... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 15 and 29. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
